text: Hameŋ 14.19 Lom 12.18, 15.2, 1 Ko 14.12, 1 Te 5.11 sadaŋ hulaŋ iamɨgali aludɨ humɨgaŋ agɨlaŋ simɨ hɨnihɨni saŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lagulamɨmɨli uami. Lɨdɨŋ hulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavalɨ agɨladɨ hɨji mɨŋaiahɨmɨli hɨji huaci viavɨla vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lagulamalama saŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ sɨbaŋ hɨnimɨli uami.
